svg:
<style  type="text/css" media="print>
@font-face {
  font-family: "Noto Serif CJK JP";
  src: url("src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/NotoSerifCJKjp-Regular.otf") format("OpenType");
}
@font-face {
  font-family: "Noto Sans CJK";
  src: url("src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/NotoSansCJK-Regular.ttc") format("OpenType");
}
